translations.english: Song Yi advised against it, but Xiang Liang did not listen.

translations.chinese: 九月，章邯夜銜枚擊項梁定陶，大破之，殺項梁。
translations.english: In the ninth month, Zhang Han bit on wooden sticks and attacked Xiang Liang at Dingtao by night, greatly defeating him and killing Xiang Liang.
At this time there was continuous rain from the seventh month until the ninth month.

translations.chinese: 沛公、項羽方攻陳留，聞梁死，士卒恐，乃與將軍呂臣引兵而東，徙懷王自盱台都彭城。
translations.english: Pei Gong and Xiang Yu were attacking Chenliu when they heard of Liang's death. The soldiers were terrified, so they joined with General Lü Chen and led troops east, moving King Huai from Xutai to Pengcheng as the capital.
